name: Desert Express (NebulaCollectif, Noxgames, GenglerCorentin, KiruB, Arnaud.Castex, Marine_Anglade, Sirhaian, Herve Gengler, marcel.lenoir, Maxime Piquot)
name_original: Desert Express (NebulaCollectif, Noxgames, GenglerCorentin, KiruB, Arnaud.Castex, Marine_Anglade, Sirhaian, Herve Gengler, marcel.lenoir, Maxime Piquot)
description:
Embark on a wild ride aboard the Desert Express!

Traverse an hostile desert and defend your train against the local entities.

You can unhook from the train, but watch out not to run out of energy!

Need some more fire power ? Hook up to the front carriage.

Need to replenish your energy ? The second carriage has you covered.

Known bugs:

- Enemies sometimes will stay in waiting state and will never fire (That's helpful right ? :o )

Credits: 

Art: HolyNgel, marcel.lenoir, Marine_Anglade, Sirhaian

Design & Prod: Herve Gengler

Programming: GenglerCorentin, kirub, Maxime Piquot

Sound: Noxgames
